vdb.name: gs-export
vdb.description: Data exported from Open House app

model.name: Source
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE WikiData( pageid integer OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'NUMBER'), title string OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'STRING'), lat bigdecimal OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'NUMBER'), lon bigdecimal OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'NUMBER'), url string OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'STRING'), image string OPTIONS (NATIVE_TYPE 'STRING') ) OPTIONS (UPDATABLE 'TRUE', NAMEINSOURCE 'WikiData');

model.name: Export
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW WikiData ( pageid integer PRIMARY KEY, title string, lat bigdecimal, lon bigdecimal, url string, image string ) OPTIONS (UPDATABLE 'TRUE') AS SELECT pageid, title, lat, lon, url, image FROM Source.WikiData;
